name: nonecclesiastical
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not belonging to or connected with the Christian religion: The company is working with a number of nonecclesiastical charities on measures to reduce child poverty. Members of the church have been very active in non-ecclesiastical areas of life.
More examplesFewer examplesThere are some excellent examples of non-ecclesiastical architecture in the city centre.The writer is less well known for his nonecclesiastical works.The building is one of the Church's properties that is also used for nonecclesiastical purposes.
